alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 4:37PM EST until March 03 at 5:15PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Washington County in east Tennessee... Central Russell County in southwestern Virginia... The City of Bristol in southwestern Virginia... Southeastern Scott County in southwestern Virginia... Washington County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 515 PM EST. * At 436 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Walnut Hill, or 8 miles east of Kingsport, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Spurgeon, Colonial Heights and Oak Grove. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 58 and 75. Interstate 81 in Virginia between mile markers 1 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Bristol; Russell; Scott; Washington
